item.title: Un primer post de prueba
item.description: ## [1] TRUE ## [1] FALSE ## [1] FALSE Vamos a tratar de usar blogdown para gestionar la p√°gina Web de PostData y el blog. hist(rnorm(100)) Podemos usar Python igualmente. import sys print(sys.version) ## 3.7.7 (default, Mar 10 2020, 15:43:33) ## [Clang 11.0.0 (clang-1100.0.33.17)] import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy.random as rng import matplotlib.cm as cm from matplotlib.animation import FuncAnimation radii=(rng.random(int(1e3))+1)**2 iota=2*np.pi*rng.random(int(1e3)) x_posit=np.sqrt(radii)*np.cos(iota) y_posit=np.sqrt(radii)*np.sin(iota) plt.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
